body: Also it would be good to guarantee after this pass runs that all the constants are at a block at the beginning of the function. This would make it easy for the interpreter to internally do an optimization where it would pre-process the constants into a list of IValues and just copy them into the first C registers when the function begins to execute.
body_html: Also it would be good to guarantee after this pass runs that all the constants are at a block at the beginning of the function. This would make it easy for the interpreter to internally do an optimization where it would pre-process the constants into a list of IValues and just copy them into the first C registers when the function begins to execute.
body_text: Also it would be good to guarantee after this pass runs that all the constants are at a block at the beginning of the function. This would make it easy for the interpreter to internally do an optimization where it would pre-process the constants into a list of IValues and just copy them into the first C registers when the function begins to execute.
